member.name: M:DevExpress.ExpressApp.Workflow.ActivitiesInformationEventArgs.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.List`1)

summary.para: Creates a new instance of the ActivitiesInformationEventArgs class.

member.param: A list of ActivityInformation objects representing activities that will be available in the rehosted workflow designer's toolbox. This parameter value is assigned to the property.

summary.para: Specifies activities that will be available in the rehosted workflow designer's toolbox.
